price: また彼らはそこで、その混ぜ物が生姜である（酒の）盃を飲まされる。
arabic: وَيُسۡقَوۡنَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wayus'qawna fīhā kasan kāna mizājuhā zanjabīlan
translations: And they will be given to drink
